description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a user registration page, handling user input for email, password, and full name, and managing registration logic including form validation, interaction with authentication provider, and navigation.

classes.name: RegisterPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the registration screen for new users.

classes.name: _RegisterPageState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form, input controllers, and submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the text editing controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, invokes registration via AuthProvider, and navigates to login page upon success.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the registration page UI, including form fields, buttons, and validation feedback.
